home.title: LatVeneer
home.subtitle: A new veneer production facility in Latvia.

liste.who_Description: Currently we can offer core birch veneer from two production lines 1300mm and 2600mm in length. Mainly the following sizes: 1300x1300; 1300x2600, 2600x1300. In the meantime we are working to install two new production lines including 1600mm.
